description: Search the web using Google Custom Search API with advanced filtering and pagination options

inputs.name: query
inputs.description: The search query string

inputs.name: cx
inputs.description: The custom search engine ID (cx parameter). If not provided, will use the default from your key configuration.

inputs.name: num
inputs.description: Number of search results to return (1-10)

inputs.name: start
inputs.description: The index of the first result to return (1-based)

inputs.name: lr
inputs.description: Restrict results to documents written in a particular language

inputs.name: safe
inputs.description: Search safety level

inputs.name: gl
inputs.description: Country code for country-specific results

inputs.name: cr
inputs.description: Restrict results to documents originating in a particular country

inputs.name: googlehost
inputs.description: The local Google domain to use for the search

inputs.name: highRange
inputs.description: Creates a range in the form [highRange...]

inputs.name: hl
inputs.description: Interface language for the search results

inputs.name: hq
inputs.description: Appends the extra query terms to the query

inputs.name: imgColorType
inputs.description: Returns black and white, grayscale, or color images

inputs.name: imgDominantColor
inputs.description: Returns images of a specific dominant color

inputs.name: imgSize
inputs.description: Returns images of a specific size

inputs.name: imgType
inputs.description: Returns images of a specific type

inputs.name: linkSite
inputs.description: Specifies that all search results should contain a link to a particular URL

inputs.name: lowRange
inputs.description: Creates a range in the form [lowRange...highRange]

inputs.name: orTerms
inputs.description: Provides additional search terms to check for in a document

inputs.name: relatedSite
inputs.description: Specifies that all search results should be pages that are related to the specified URL

inputs.name: rights
inputs.description: Filters based on licensing. Can be comma-separated string or array

inputs.name: searchType
inputs.description: Specifies the search type. Leave empty for web search, or set to 'image' for image search

inputs.name: siteSearch
inputs.description: Specifies all search results should be pages from a given site

inputs.name: siteSearchFilter
inputs.description: Controls whether the results are restricted to documents in the site specified by siteSearch

inputs.name: sort
inputs.description: Sorts the results by date

inputs.name: exactTerms
inputs.description: Identifies a phrase that all documents in the search results must contain

inputs.name: excludeTerms
inputs.description: Identifies a word or phrase that should not appear in any documents in the search results. Can be comma-separated string or array

inputs.name: fileType
inputs.description: Restricts results to files of a specified extension. Can be comma-separated string or array

inputs.name: dateRestrict
inputs.description: Restricts results to documents based on date

outputs.name: items
outputs.description: Array of cleaned search result items with title, link, displayLink, and snippet

outputs.name: searchInformation
outputs.description: Information about the search query and results

outputs.name: totalResults
outputs.description: Total number of search results available

outputs.name: searchTime
outputs.description: Time taken for the search in seconds
